title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy, about 5-7 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Pecorino Romano, Parmesan, and black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the pasta.
Remove skillet from heat and add hot pasta to the pancetta.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, 1 tbsp spice blend, garlic, and ginger for at least 2 hours.
Grill or bake marinated chicken until cooked through, about 15-20 minutes.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onions until golden.
Add remaining spice blend and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Blend the sauce until smooth, then return to pan.
Add cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Fresh romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Make the dressing: Mince anchovies and garlic together into a paste.
In a bowl, whisk together anchovy paste, egg yolk, lemon juice, and mustard.
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking constantly until emulsified.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Toss chopped romaine with dressing until well coated.
Top with croutons and shaved Parmesan.
Serve immediately for best texture.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef in crispy taco shells with lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned.
Add diced onion and garlic, cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with shredded lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.
Serve immediately while shells are still crispy.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add broccoli and carrots, stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Add bell peppers, snap peas, and mushrooms, cook for 2 minutes.
In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Pour sauce over vegetables and toss to coat.
Cook for 1 more minute until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C) with a pizza stone if available.
Roll out pizza dough into a 12-inch circle on floured surface.
Brush dough with olive oil mixed with minced garlic.
Spread pizza sauce evenly over the dough.
Arrange mozzarella slices and tomato slices on top.
Season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven, top with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil.
Let cool for 2 minutes before slicing.
